Security.py¶

job_monitoring_app.backend.app.internal.security.create_access_token(data: dict, expires_minutes: float, secret: str, algorithm: str) → str¶

Creates an access token

Parameters:

  • data – Data to be encoded in the token

  • expires_minutes – Time in minutes

  • secret – Secret key

  • algorithm – Algorithm to be used for encoding the token

Returns:

Encoded token
